response.original_title: My Image Observes Your Image If It Is Possible to Observe It
response.overview: Phuttiphong Aroonpheng made this work during an artist-in-residence programme at the Museum of Modern Art (IMMA) in Dublin, Ireland. The Thai film maker gazed in amazement at his new northern home base. He floated like a cloud through his temporary city, literally and metaphorically.
response.title: My Image Observes Your Image If It Is Possible to Observe It
